inputMemo.inputMemo: Enter your note here (e.g., context, usage, translated text, etc.)

createAccount.title: ① Creating an Account
createAccount.one: Create an account through [For Beginners] or sign in with Google.

createText.title: ② Creating a New Text
createText.two: (2) Name your text and then create it.

inputText.title: ③ Entering the Text
inputText.one: (1) Copy any text you like from the internet (Command + C).
inputText.two: (2) Then paste it directly into the text you created earlier (Command + V).

learn.title: ④ Learning
learn.one: - Tap on words or scroll to select phrases to check their meanings.
learn.two: - If you want to know the usage or other meanings, ask AI.
learn.three: - Use the read-aloud feature to repeatedly listen to parts you cannot catch.
learn.four: - Create notes to save the usage and meanings of words.

multilingualSupport.title: Multilingual Support
multilingualSupport.two: It should support the language you want to learn.
multilingualSupport.three: Supported languages: Japanese, English, Español, Français, Deutsch, Italiano, Português, Русский, عربي, 한국어, 中文, हिंदी

translation.title: Fast and Accurate Translation
translation.one: Lingo Fill quickly translates unknown words and phrases.
translation.two: To translate, simply click on a word or select multiple words for phrases.

ai.title: AI Assistance
ai.two: Use AI actively for words and phrases whose usage or meanings are unclear.

audio.title: Voice Read-Out
audio.one: Lingo Fill allows you to listen to natural voice read-outs from any part of the text.

memo.title: Creating Personal Notes
memo.one: Lingo Fill lets you quickly create notes on usage and meanings.
memo.two: Even if you don't understand the meanings or usages of words or phrases, AI will teach you.

text.title: Unlimited Text Storage
text.one: Lingo Fill allows for unlimited text storage.
text.two: Your texts are stored online, so they won't take up space on your device.

share.title: Sharing Across Multiple Devices
share.one: Lingo Fill stores texts online for each account.
share.two: By sharing the same account, you can share the same texts with friends.

free.title: All Features Are Free
free.one: All of these features in Lingo Fill are available for free.
free.two: There is absolutely no charge for using them.

overview.one: A simple long-text focused language learning service.
overview.two: You can easily create your own language learning texts.
